data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Danyi, Laszlo, Balazs, Gergely, Tuf, Ivan Hadrian (2019): Taxonomic status and behavioural documentation of the troglobiont Lithobiusmatulici (Myriapoda, Chilopoda) from the Dinaric Alps: Are there semiaquatic centipedes in caves? ZooKeys 848: 1-20, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.848.33084, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.848.33084
